example.text: With #Title42 set to expire on Thursday, Border Patrol officials are seeing an unprecedented surge at our southern border. Joe Biden’s open-border policies have led to this crisis. We must secure our southern border NOW. From [[user]]: [[url]]
I enjoyed discussing how we can work together to serve our communities. Thank you for having me!
Dear Friends, This week, the House of Representatives voted to authorize funding for our military. I was proud to vote yes on this crucial legislation and support our troops.
I was happy to see this pass the House of Representatives. It's time to end Joe Biden's war on American energy.

Click below to watch my video message about this week in Washington: Meetings With West Tennesseans It was great to visit with West Tennessee members of the Citizens' Climate Lobby. Thank you for taking the time to meet with me.

I was in Staten Island, NY with my colleagues on [[user]] to talk with folks about ways to bolster America’s trade policy. American workers, businesses, and farmers deserve improved trade policies that secure our supply chains and combat China’s growing influence. [[url]]
Dear Friends, This week, the House of Representatives voted to authorize funding for our military. I was proud to vote yes on this crucial legislation and support our troops.
